column2: Although you are a practicioner of anima magic, you follow the teachings of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] first. However, you've been wondering if there's something to all those philosophies about elemental spirits, communion with forces of nature, and the like. Perhaps it's time to leave behind the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith and dedicate yourself to the study of magic?
I must become a greater mage.
I will not turn away from the wisdom of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].
